# Class EntityMatch

Class representing a matched entity in text. Contains information about an entity detected during named entity recognition.

##### Index

### Methods

getEntityName getRuleName getText

## Methods

### getEntityName

  * getEntityName(): string

Gets the name of the entity that was matched.

#### Returns string

Entity name or null if not available




### getRuleName

  * getRuleName(): string

Gets the specific rule that triggered this match.

#### Returns string

Rule name or null if not available




### getText

  * getText(): string

Gets the text that was matched.

#### Returns string

Matched text string or null if not available




### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
